code: import React from'react';import utils from'../../../common/utils';import constant from'../../../constants/constant';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RowAgency(_ref){var agency=_ref.agency,handleDelete=_ref.handleDelete,getIdUpdate=_ref.getIdUpdate;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:agency.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:agency.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:agency.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:constant.IMAGE_AGENCY+agency.image,className:"center-blog",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"image-columm",src:constant.IMAGE_AGENCY+agency.image,alt:agency.name})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{id:"blog-detail",className:"row-clamp",children:agency.detail}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:utils.getTime(agency.createDate)+"  "+utils.convertDateTime(agency.createDate)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-primary","data-toggle":"modal","data-target":".bd-example-modal-lg",onClick:function onClick(){return getIdUpdate(agency);},children:"Update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:function onClick(){return handleDelete(agency.id);},children:"Delete"})]})]});}export default RowAgency;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import utils from '../../../common/utils' import constant from '../../../constants/constant' function RowAgency({agency,handleDelete,getIdUpdate}) { return ( {agency.id} {agency.name} {agency.address} {agency.detail} {utils.getTime(agency.createDate)+" "+utils.convertDateTime(agency.createDate) } ) } export default RowAgency
